import.title: Bulk Import
import.upload.title: Upload Item CSV file
import.upload.description: If a 'sku' is provided and exists, the item is updated. Otherwise, a new item is created. The 'name' column is required for all new items.
import.locations.title: Bulk Import Locations
import.locations.upload.title: Upload Location CSV file
import.locations.upload.description: To create a sub-location, provide its parent's ID in the 'parentHumanId' column. If 'parentHumanId' is empty, a new parent location will be created, and 'humanId' becomes required. Existing locations are updated based on a matching 'humanId' (for parents) or a matching 'parentHumanId' and 'name' (for sub-locations).
import.confirm.title: Confirm Import
import.confirm.message: This will import the file '{fileName}' into the store '{storeName}'. Are you sure you want to continue?
import.errors.missingName: Name is required for new items.
import.errors.duplicateName: An item with the name '{name}' already exists. To update it, provide its SKU.
import.errors.invalidCost: Invalid value for {field}. Must be a number.
import.errors.invalidBoolean: Invalid value for isDiscontinued. Use TRUE or FALSE.
import.errors.missingHumanIdForParent: humanId is required for parent locations (when parentHumanId is empty).
import.errors.parentNotFound: Parent location with humanId '{humanId}' not found in this store.
import.errors.duplicateHumanId: A parent location with humanId '{humanId}' already exists in this store.
import.errors.duplicateSubLocationName: A sub-location named '{name}' already exists under parent '{parentHumanId}'.
import.errors.noStoreSelected: Please select a store before importing locations.
